items.title: Arduino and Programming
items.headline: This entire course of Arduino covers the various concepts and projects from beginner to advance level
objectives_summary: All the concepts in these video lectures covers the basic to advanced level with the suitable examples. Some of the concepts are provided with exercises at the end for the sake of practise.   The total course is about 6-7 hours of duration, starting from the basic concepts of the electronics and covers the basics of programming along with the Arduino programming.   Pre-requisite An Arduino Uno board and a Laptop or Computer Develop the intrest and ethusiasm to learn this course  Projects Different interfaces with the Arduino boards by the variety of sensors and motors is explained with practical connection and coding. Although many small projects are built in this course, where this experience will be helpful to enrich your skills to develop the innovative projects in the field of electroncis and robotics.  Outcomes After successful completion of this course, you will gain the basics of electronics and can learn the advanced concepts of embedded systems, microcontrollers and microprocessors.  With the concepts and projects learnt in this code, you can independently design and develop your own electronic and robotic projects.
